original: Niruddhaṁ nirodheti, vigataṁ vigameti, khīṇaṁ khepeti, atthaṅgataṁ atthaṅgameti, abbhatthaṅgataṁ abbhatthaṅgametīti?
analyzed: ▁niruddh aṃ ▁nirodh eti ▁vigat aṃ ▁vi gam eti ▁kh ī ṇ aṃ ▁kh e pe ti ▁atthaṃ gat aṃ ▁atthaṃ gam eti ▁abbh atthaṃ gat aṃ ▁abbh atthaṃ gam etīti

original: Hañci atītaṁ niruddhaṁ, no ca vata re vattabbe—
Hañci atītaṁ natthi, no ca vata re vattabbe—
Ajātaṁ ajaneti, asañjātaṁ asañjaneti, anibbattaṁ anibbatteti, apātubhūtaṁ apātubhāvetīti?
analyzed: ▁a jāt aṃ ▁ ajan eti ▁as añj ā taṃ ▁as a ñjan eti ▁a nibbatt aṃ ▁a nibbatt eti ▁ apā tu bhūt aṃ ▁ apā tu bhāv etīti

original: Hañci anāgataṁ ajātaṁ, no ca vata re vattabbe—
Hañci anāgataṁ natthi, no ca vata re vattabbe—
Ratto rāgaṁ jahati, duṭṭho dosaṁ jahati, mūḷho mohaṁ jahati, kiliṭṭho kilese jahatīti?
analyzed: ▁ratt o ▁rāg aṃ ▁jah ati ▁ duṭṭh o ▁dos aṃ ▁jah ati ▁ mūḷh o ▁moh aṃ ▁jah ati ▁ki li ṭṭh o ▁kiles e ▁jah atīti

original: rāgena rāgaṁ jahati, dosena dosaṁ jahati, mohena mohaṁ jahati, kilesehi kilese jahatīti?
analyzed: ▁rāg ena ▁rāg aṃ ▁jah ati ▁dos ena ▁dos aṃ ▁jah ati ▁moh ena ▁moh aṃ ▁jah ati ▁kiles ehi ▁kiles e ▁jah atīti

original: Kusalākusalā sāvajjānavajjā hīnapaṇītā kaṇhasukkasappaṭibhāgā dhammā sammukhībhāvaṁ āgacchantīti?
analyzed: ▁kusalākusal ā ▁sāvajj ān avajj ā ▁hīn a paṇīt ā ▁kaṇha su kk a sa ppaṭi bhāg ā ▁dhammā ▁sam mukh ī bhāv aṃ ▁āgacchant īti
